research_question: Investigate how sex affects quality of life recovery trajectories in cardiac surgery patients. Additionally, examine whether the rehabilitation program (Standard vs Enhanced) moderates the recovery pattern.
hypothesis: Males may report higher QoL. Enhanced rehab may accelerate recovery.

research_question: Investigate how sex affects 6-minute walk distance recovery trajectories in cardiac surgery patients. Additionally, examine whether the rehabilitation program (Standard vs Enhanced) moderates the recovery pattern.
hypothesis: Males likely walk further. Enhanced rehab may accelerate improvement.

research_question: Investigate how sex affects depression (phq-9) recovery trajectories in cardiac surgery patients. Additionally, examine whether the rehabilitation program (Standard vs Enhanced) moderates the recovery pattern.
hypothesis: Females may report higher depression. Enhanced rehab may improve mental health.

research_question: Investigate how diabetes status affects quality of life recovery trajectories in cardiac surgery patients. Additionally, examine whether the rehabilitation program (Standard vs Enhanced) moderates the recovery pattern.
hypothesis: Diabetes associated with lower QoL. Enhanced rehab may help diabetic patients more.

research_question: Investigate how diabetes status affects 6-minute walk distance recovery trajectories in cardiac surgery patients. Additionally, examine whether the rehabilitation program (Standard vs Enhanced) moderates the recovery pattern.
hypothesis: Diabetes associated with shorter walk distance. Enhanced rehab may help.

research_question: Investigate how diabetes status affects depression (phq-9) recovery trajectories in cardiac surgery patients. Additionally, examine whether the rehabilitation program (Standard vs Enhanced) moderates the recovery pattern.
hypothesis: Comorbid diabetes may increase depression. Enhanced rehab may provide support.

research_question: Investigate how surgery complexity affects quality of life recovery trajectories in cardiac surgery patients. Additionally, examine whether the rehabilitation program (Standard vs Enhanced) moderates the recovery pattern.
hypothesis: Complex surgery associated with slower recovery. Enhanced rehab may improve outcomes.

research_question: Investigate how surgery complexity affects 6-minute walk distance recovery trajectories in cardiac surgery patients. Additionally, examine whether the rehabilitation program (Standard vs Enhanced) moderates the recovery pattern.
hypothesis: Complex surgery may impair physical recovery. Enhanced rehab may help.

research_question: Investigate how surgery complexity affects depression (phq-9) recovery trajectories in cardiac surgery patients. Additionally, examine whether the rehabilitation program (Standard vs Enhanced) moderates the recovery pattern.
hypothesis: Complex surgery may increase depression. Enhanced rehab may help.
